original_text: At that time, David's son Adonijah, was telling everyone, ‘I will become the next king.’ He got for himself chariots and men who would ride on horses. He also had 50 men to run in front of him as his guards. Haggith was Adonijah's mother.
korean_text: 그 때에 학깃의 아들 아도니야가 스스로 높여서 이르기를 내가 왕이 되리라 하고 자기를 위하여 병거와 기병과 호위병 오십 명을 준비하니

sentences.original_text: At that time, David's son Adonijah, was telling everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그때에 다윗의 아들 아도니야는 모두에게 말하고 있었습니다

sentences.korean_translation: 그의 경호원으로 앞에서 달리게 하기 위함이었습니다
